title: Itsuka Kamen Wo Nugu Tame Ni  ~Warau Kishin To Yumemiru Dorei~
alternative_title: One Day To Take Off The Mask: A Sneering  Demon-God And A Dreaming Slave ; いつか仮面を脱ぐ為に ～嗤う鬼神と夢見る奴隷～
status: One Day To Take Off The Mask: A Sneering  Demon-God And A Dreaming Slave ; いつか仮面を脱ぐ為に ～嗤う鬼神と夢見る奴隷～
description:
Description :
        A blooming romance between two individuals, as seen through a Demon's mask
《Samurai》 Reo Aramogord is the strongest soldier protecting the kingdom, in the middle of the conflict as he was about to destroy his enemy, he fell in love at first sight , a girl who is a "part" of the enemy, A romance story through the "masks" they wear to war.
